name: Angles Staked Sonic
description: Angles protocol is part of a transformative DeFi ecosystem designed to enhance economic opportunities on the Sonic Network. At its core is $anS, a liquid staking token (LST) specifically designed for staking $S tokens on the Sonic Network. anS leverages optimized staking strategies to provide greater rewards compared to traditional staking solutions, maintains a closer peg to the value of S token, ensuring a seamless and predictable user experience and utilizes distributed validator technology (DVT) to uphold the Sonic Networkâ€™s commitment to decentralization while enhancing security. With its innovative design and proven foundation, anS represents the next step in liquid staking, empowering users to maximize their staking rewards without sacrificing flexibility or network principles.
